alert.note: Alert for Randolph (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 15 at 7:05PM CDT until April 15 at 7:45PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: The National Weather Service in St Louis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Randolph County in southwestern Illinois... * Until 745 PM CDT. * At 705 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Baldwin to near Ste. Genevieve to near Womac, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Chester, Sparta, Bremen, Steeleville, Percy, Coulterville, Tilden, Eden, Blair, Rockwood, Kaskaskia, Welge, New Palestine, and Shiloh!** weakened. Hill. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for south central and southwestern Illinois...and southeastern Missouri.
